name: PIM_Hepatic_Function_Panel_CPTs
title: PIM_Hepatic_Function_Panel_CPTs
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Procedural codes for Hepatic Function Panel lab test),(Data Element Scope: Identification of patients with a procedure code for Hepatic Function Panel lab test),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Hepatic function panel This panel must include the following: Albumin (82040) Bilirubin, total (82247) Bilirubin, direct (82248) Phosphatase, alkaline (84075) Protein, total (84155) Transferase, alanine amino (ALT) (SGPT) (84460) Transferase, aspartate amino (AST) (SGOT) (84450)

contains.display: Hepatic function panel This panel must include the following: Albumin (82040) Bilirubin, total (82247) Bilirubin, direct (82248) Phosphatase, alkaline (84075) Protein, total (84155) Transferase, alanine amino (ALT) (SGPT) (84460) Transferase, aspartate amino (AST) (SGOT) (84450)
